English: Restart Expedition to get full localization
Description:
A subtitle for the language settings that shows when the player is in an expedition.
You are allowed to change language but certain in-game texts won't be localized until you restart the expedition.

French.Translation: Redémarrez l'expédition pour afficher la traduction complète

Italian.Translation: Riavvia la spedizione per ottenere la localizzazione completa

German.Translation: Starte die Expedition neu, um die vollständige Lokalisierung zu erhalten

Spanish.Translation: Reiniciar expedición para disfrutar de todo el texto traducido

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Reiniciar a expedição para obter a localização completa

Polish.Translation: Zrestartuj ekspedycję, aby uzyskać pełną wersję językową

Japanese.Translation: エクスペディションをリスタートしてローカリゼーションを完了

Korean.Translation: 모든 텍스트를 현지화하려면 탐사를 다시 시작하세요

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 重新啟動遠征以獲得完整的當地語言版

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 重启任务以显示完整汉化版本

name: MainMenu.Settings.Language_Subtitle_InExpedition_Restart
